name: Death💀Reaper
description:
Death Repaer is yet another combat prototype I'm creating to improve my skills, much like https://whitewatt.itch.io/samurai-prototype-ue4. 

It's still unfinished though, as I plan to add some enemies and polish it a bit more so it ends up in a similar state as the Samurai prototype.

In comparison with the samurai prototype, this one has aerial attacks which I feel looks quite fancy.

There is no menu, so you have to alt +F4 to leave the game.

The controls are WASD to move, shift to dash, space bar to jump and left mouse to attack.
